video_title: iPhone 17 Pro MagSafe Camera Grip & Battery - Telesin Master Grip Unboxing
summary: 要是能为iPhone 17 Pro设计一款MagSafe相机手柄就太棒了！它可以直接吸附在手机上，提升拍照时的握持感，手柄上还集成了变焦、切换模式和快门等实体按键，操作起来会非常方便。如果它本身还能当作充电宝给手机续航，再配上Telesin的MagSafe补光灯，那简直就是一套完美的摄影组合！
comment_text: A MagSafe camera attachment for the iPhone 17 Pro! You don't have to use the case, but with this grip, it provides better handling while taking pictures and offers buttons for ease of access. Like zoom, switch modes, snap pics, etc. It's also a battery bank, allowing you to charge your phone simultaneously. Telesin also makes a MagSafe light which makes this the perfect combo!

iPhone 17 Pro vs Xiaomi 15 Ultra Camera Comparison
summary: 我的小米15 Ultra拍照更强。我已经和朋友的iPhone 17 Pro Max比过了，无论是白天还是晚上，我的小米都完胜。当然，具体效果也取决于你小米15的后期模式怎么调校。
comment_text: My Xiaomi 15 ultra takes better photos. I've already made a comparison against a friend of mine's iPhone 17 pro max and my Xiaomi surpassed it both day and night, but it depends on the post mode of your Xiaomi 15.

video_title: iPhone 17 Pro vs Xiaomi 15 Ultra Camera Comparison
summary: 这位用户在分享他的观察：小米手机的“鲜艳模式”在HDR和动态范围上表现得更为突出，其人像功能中的“大师模式”也采用了相同的风格。而“真实模式”的成像效果则更贴近传统相机的质感，与普通手机的风格有所区别。
comment_text: Vibrant mode on Xiaomi  has more aggressive HDR  and dynamic range, also Master mode in portrait is the same as vibrant.., Authentic is closer to camera style much more than a phone ...

video_title: iPhone 17 Pro vs Xiaomi 15 Ultra Camera Comparison
summary: 考虑到iPhone的硬件其实落后了两三代，它能有如此表现已经很出色了。它在人像和自拍上优于小米，日光下则不相上下。小米的长焦虽强，但我怀疑除了偶尔为之，这个功能对多数人尤其是在夜间的实用性。再加上小米15 Ultra在英国高达1300英镑的售价，选择起来确实不易。但对我这个身处苹果生态的人来说，答案就不言而喻了。
comment_text:
The iPhone held up very well when you realise its hardware is 2-3 generations behind. It beats the Xiaomi in portrait and selfies; they are very close in daylight. No doubt Xiaomi is better with telephoto, so if that is your thing, then Xiaomi is better, but I am unsure how many people really care about telephoto, especially at night, other than for that rare occasion (s). 

With the Xiaomi 15 Ultra at £1300, as usual, much higher for the UK version than the Chinese version, it is difficult to choose between the two. As I am in the Apple ecosystem, it is an easy choice.
